name: Gabriel Moral
description: Hello! I'm Gabriel Moral, I'm from Valencia, Spain. I love programming and currently I'm working at Dimatica Software Development company. You can contact me at

responsibilities: Collaborating with Aguas de Valencia to improve the application involved into the water supply management in Valencia.
Responsible for installing and configuring the continuous integration system.
Responsible for trainning and helping other team members with unit tests and architectural design.
jobs.habilities: C#, TDD, Design Patterns, WPF, Telerik, WCF, Entity Framework, TFS, SQL Server, Unit tests, Continuos integration, Javascript, Openlayers.

responsibilities: Development of an application to manage specialised company in agricultural field seeds, vegetables seeds and cereal products.
Team leader of small team, responsible of giving technical guidelines and distribute tasks.
jobs.habilities: C#, TDD, Design Patterns, WPF, Telerik, WCF, Entity Framework, TFS, SQL Server.

responsibilities: Development of a virtual office destined to manage the service requests for Port Authority Valencia.
Development of a framework to build web and desktop applications for Port Authority Valencia.
Development of a web portal to manage and geolocate port activities in real-time.
jobs.habilities: C#, Vb.Net, Asp.Net, Infragistics, WCF, WF, Entity Framework, HTML5, Javascript, CSS3, Knockout, Bootstrap, Requirejs, Git, SVN, Agile methodologies, Postgres, SQL Server.

responsibilities: Sanitas: Plugin developments for Project Server 2007, human resources time reports, estimate cost reports and earned value reports.
CajaSur: Developing an application to manage and prioritize projects and customer's ideas.
jobs.habilities: C#, Asp.Net, Project Server, SharePoint, InfoPath, Workflow Foundation, Web services, Reporting Services, SQL Server.

responsibilities: Development of an internal application to manage database stored procedures.
Development of an application to manage costs of phone calls and improve profit margins.
jobs.habilities: C#, Asp.Net, Telerik controls, Reporting services, Spring.Net, NHibernate, SQL Server.
